description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires HR services...and staffing needs.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Stream 1 – Human Resources Services for the Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE), Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)

**Reference:** cb-8023-35707630
**Solicitation Number:** NRCan-5000075412

**Key Dates:**
* Publication Date: 2023-08-09
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-07 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-07

**Description:**
The Office of Energy Efficiency (OEE) at Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires human resources services to support its operations. The services will include organizational design and classification and staffing consulting to create positions, reorganize the current reporting structure, and proactively recruit qualified staff.

**United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC)**
The services fall under the following UNSPSC codes:
* 80101511 – Human resources consulting service
* 80110000 – Human resources services

**Notice Details:**
* Contracting Entity: Jinping Wei (NRCan)
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4, Canada
* Contact: Jinping Wei at (343) 541-7931 or jinping.wei@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca

**Solicitation Method:**
The solicitation is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement, with a competitive open-bidding process. The selected bidder will be chosen based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Access the Notice:**
The full notice can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8023/notification---nrcan-5000075412
